about_the_game:
Good morning loner, welcome to hell.

Welcome to Fallen Mankind MMO, a world where paradise has turned into a nightmare. The Zone was once a cluster of beautiful islands, the kind you’d see on postcards—lush, vibrant, and full of life. But everything changed after the Event. No one knows exactly what happened, but one day, the skies cracked, the ground was trembling, and strange, unexplainable phenomena began to spread. These anomalies turned the islands into a warped, dangerous wasteland where reality doesn’t always play by the rules.

Governments tried to intervene, but it wasn’t long before they gave up and finished operations, cutting their losses and leaving the islands to rot. That’s when the private military corporations swooped in, hoping to uncover the secrets of the anomalies. The most infamous of these was the Parallax Group. They were well-funded, ruthless, and dead set on figuring out what made The Zone tick. These days, no one knows if they’re still out there. Some say they’re gone for good, while others whisper about shadowy figures and advanced tech still roaming the islands.

  • Heirloom: A ragtag group of loners and misfits trying to do some good in a place that’s mostly bad. They’re scavengers, researchers, and medics, patching up wounds and digging up answers about The Zone’s mysteries. If you’re looking for people who believe in second chances, you might find a home here.

  • Outsiders: The kind of people your mom warned you about. These guys live by one rule: take what you want, and don’t leave witnesses. They thrive on chaos and violence, carving a path through The Zone with no regard for anyone but themselves.

  • Parallax Remnants: They’re less of a faction and more of a legend. Parallax left a big footprint when they were here, high-tech equipment, strange experiments, and a reputation for getting what they wanted, no matter the cost. Some say they’re still out there, pulling the strings, but no one really knows for sure.

    The Zone itself is as dangerous as any faction. Anomalies can suck you in, burn you alive, or just straight-up warp reality around you. But they also create artifacts—strange objects that can grant incredible power if you’re brave (or foolish) enough to claim them.

    Survival isn’t easy here. Resources are scarce, alliances are fragile, and every decision you make could mean life or death. Will you try to bring people together, uncover the secrets of the anomalies, and maybe make the world a little less horrible? Or will you give in to the chaos, letting The Zone shape you into its next monster?

    In Fallen Mankind MMO, the choice is yours. Welcome to The Zone. Try not to die.



What is Fallen Mankind MMO?
Fallen Mankind MMO is infestation survivor stories, H1Z1, stalker and stalker online inspired MMO game which will contain basebuilding, competitive PvP, Hardcore PvE content, Grinding for gear and vast open world.

Features:

  • Auction house for players to buy and sell gear/materials with eachother

  • NPC Traders in different locations with different values

  • Infestation Survivor Stories inspired movement and PvP content

  • Locations with horrible monsters and valubale loot to grind

  • Day and night cycle

  • Compound building (Beasts of prey inspired basebuilding)

  • Server capacity up and more than 100+ concurrent players

  • Different weapons and weapon crafting, attachable scopes and other variables

  • Loot system

(This list is subject to change) Game engine: Unity

content_descriptors.notes: Shooting other humanoid players, shooting and killing monsters.

name: Fallen Mankind MMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/Windows 7
  • Processor: quad core 2.4ghz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460/ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD® FX 8150 3.6 GHz or Intel® Core™ i7 2600 3.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX3050 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection

short_description: Good morning, loner. Welcome to hell. In Fallen Mankind MMO, Explore The Zone, survive deadly anomalies, and choose your path among three factions. Build bases, battle players, face horrors, and uncover secrets in a hardcore, open-world MMO inspired by STALKER and survival classics.
